description.raw:
lights that do not cast shadows are assumed to use more advanced techniques in ogre 2.1 \(e.g. Forward3D or ForwardClustered\) and need to be explicitly enabled, see this [ogre post](https://forums.ogre3d.org/viewtopic.php?t=94229).

Without this change, non-shadow-casting point lights and spot lights will just be disabled. 

Added a non-shadow-casting spot light to ogre2\_demo. The image below shows the scene before \(left\) and after \(right\) the fix. The spot light is completely disabled \(left\) when clustered forward rendering is not enabled.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/zq9ear/images/950416229-ogre_forward_compare.png)

Added a non-shadow-casting spot light to ogre2_demo. The image below shows the scene before (left) and after (right) the fix. The spot light is completely disabled (left) when clustered forward rendering is not enabled.
